service.name: core-debugger
service.description: Monitors and debugs Vrooli core infrastructure (CLI, orchestrator, resource manager, setup scripts) with file-based issue tracking and workaround database

ui.description: Core debugger status page UI port

setup.description: Initialize Core Debugger with file-based storage

steps.name: initialize-component-registry
build-api
steps.run: cd api && go mod download && go build -o core-debugger-api .

steps.name: install-ui-deps
steps.run: if command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1; then pnpm install --filter core-debugger-ui...; else cd ui && npm install; fi

steps.name: build-ui
steps.run: if command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1; then pnpm --filter core-debugger-ui run build; else cd ui && npm run build; fi

steps.name: show-urls
steps.run:
echo 'ğŸ” Core Debugger initialized
  ğŸ“Š Status Page: http://localhost:${UI_PORT}
  ğŸ“¡ API: http://localhost:${API_PORT}
  ğŸ¯ CLI: core-debugger --help
  ğŸ“‚ Data: ./data/

ğŸ’¡ Check core health:
  core-debugger check-health
  core-debugger list-issues
  core-debugger status --verbose'

steps.name: start-api
steps.description: Start Go API server in background

steps.name: start-ui
steps.run: cd ui && UI_PORT=${UI_PORT} API_PORT=${API_PORT} NODE_ENV=production node server.js

steps.name: initial-health-check
steps.description: Run initial health check on all components

steps.name: show-urls
steps.run:
echo 'ğŸ” Core Debugger running:
  ğŸ“Š Status Page: http://localhost:$UI_PORT
  ğŸ“¡ API: http://localhost:$API_PORT/health
  ğŸ¯ CLI: core-debugger --help

ğŸ”¬ Monitor core components:
  core-debugger status
  core-debugger check-health --component cli
  core-debugger list-issues --severity critical

ğŸ“ Report issues:
  core-debugger report-issue --component orchestrator --description "Error details"
  core-debugger analyze-issue <issue-id>'

steps.name: archive-old-issues
steps.run: mkdir -p data/archive && find data/issues -name '*.json' -mtime +30 -exec mv {} data/archive/ \;

steps.name: cleanup-summary
steps.run: echo 'Cleanup complete. Archived $(find data/archive -name "*.json" | wc -l) old issues.'

claude-code.purpose: Intelligent issue analysis and fix generation
claude-code.description: Analyzes core issues and suggests fixes
